title: LILLEY: Ford calls out to industry and industry answers the call - Toronto Sun
description: LILLEY: Ford calls out to industry and industry answers the call Toronto Sun COVID-19: Ontario urges businesses to produce medical items in short supply CBC.ca Those who can't afford rent due to COVID-19 will not face eviction, Ontario premier says CTV News R…
content: We need your help that was Premier Doug Ford s plea to Ontario s industrial base on Saturday expanding on a call made earlier in the week to try to make essential items to fight COVID right here at home The Ontario spirit never ceases to amaze me sa chars
